basics.name: Thomas Legrand
basics.label: AI Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer (TypeScript, Vue.js, React.js) and former Data Scientist (Python, SQL), passionate about artificial intelligence and LLMs. With a background combining data analysis, machine learning, and development, I support the implementation and integration of innovative AI solutions in business applications. Member of the Organization, Technical, and Community poles at Data4Good.

work.name: FREELANCEREPUBLIK
work.summary:
- Development and refactoring of internal recruitment back office with Cypress E2E tests
- Development of a synchronization module between internal back office <> CRM
- Development of a synchronization module between internal back office <> Contract management tool
- Design and development of Deno 2 microservices with load management via BullMQ worker
- Design and development of recruitment assistance Postings <> Candidates via AI
- Development of in-house CV parsing by AI
- Co-creation of an AI candidate matching SaaS
Technologies: Node, Vue, GraphQL, Typescript, BullMQ, Redis, LLM, Deno, Vector search, n8n, Cypress, Jest, Hubspot, Gemini, OpenAI, MongoDB, Supabase, Postgres, Nuxt3

work.name: Huvy
work.summary: MVP of the application from a mockup. (Authentication, portal, photo upload, melanoma detection API, patient dashboard). Technologies: Next.js, React, React-Query, Tailwind, Django

work.name: Ornikar
work.summary:
- Student knowledge modeling via Knowledge Tracing and recommendations for personalized learning
- Publication of an article on the first Machine Learning project at Ornikar
- Modeling the insurance risk of driving school students
- Analytical Engineering: consolidation of the dbt stack, addition of documentation, unit tests and data quality
- Predictive algorithm for the probability of success in the theory test (+150k views / month)
- Lead Scoring algorithm
- Automation of inference pipelines via Airflow DAG
- Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for administrative documents
- Deployment of Cloud Run on Google Cloud Platform via Terraform
Technologies: dbt, SQL, DVC, Python, Airflow, Docker, LightGBM, Scikit-learn, Bigquery, GCP, Terraform

work.name: Mention
work.summary:
- Sentiment analysis from pre-trained neural networks (+ 1000 requests/s)
- Keyword extraction, Named Entity Recognition
- Information stream clustering
- Text graph creation
- Real-time anomaly detection
- Suggestion of the best time to publish
- Instagram trend report
- Logo detection in images
- Knowledge graph
Technologies: Python, NLP, spaCy, Scikit-learn, Pytorch, Keras, Tensorflow, Docker, BigQuery, gRPC

work.name: Mention
work.summary: Work with Twitter, Facebook and Instagram APIs. Completed projects: Automatic interest assignment, publication time suggestion, highlighting relevant mentions, improving web page parsing.

work.name: efluid SAS
work.summary: Implementation of a document indexing tool for the development team (ADOC format) with search engine (lunr.js) with indexing performed via NodeJs. Implementation of a tool to convert ADOC documents to Html presentation. Automation via Maven

work.name: efluid SAS
work.summary: Development of automated integration tests in Java for TP processes with JUnit.

volunteer.summary:
Association with +7500 members with a season of a dozen projects per year.

- Technical pole member: Definition of technical standards, project support, contribution to hosting a sovereign and Open Source stack via our Ansible infrastructure.
- Community pole member: Animating the volunteer community and developing the Nice branch
- Off-season and Season 10: BechdelAI creating tools and studies to raise awareness of gender equality and inequality issues in cinema

education.area: Major in Statistical Modeling and Applications
Machine Learning, Data mining, Cloud technologies, Network Security

projects.name: Rent Control
projects.summary: Co-creator of a browser extension analyzing real estate listings to indicate whether the rent complies with rent control regulations. Work in collaboration with several French municipalities and data provider to the Foundation for Housing the Disadvantaged for its annual barometer.

projects.name: Allobobo
projects.summary: RAG chatbot for health questions based only on reliable sources (HAS) vectorized in Qdrant. Web interface in React / Hono and Mistral via Vercel AI SDK.

projects.name: Brevity
projects.summary: News aggregation application with auto transcription and auto summary to limit overconsumption of content in NuxtJS and Vercel AI SDK.

projects.name: Myditate
projects.summary: AI-generated meditation application, with Text To Speech in NuxtJS and Vercel AI SDK.

projects.name: DishNow
projects.summary: Recipe saving social network powered by AI and news feed with dish sharing, likes, and comments. Pocketbase, and several rewrites in NuxtJS, HTMX and Astro, React/Hono.

projects.name: Molkky
projects.summary: React PWA for tracking a Molkky game with history of last throws and cancellation of incorrect entries.

projects.name: Velibetter
projects.summary: Angular PWA alternative to the official Velib app that allows you to check the number of bikes and available spaces at the nearest Velib stations using time series. Uses accelerometer for guidance.
